kw.name: Dado que o browser esteja aberto
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: Cenário 1 – Apresentar a opção de Consulta

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela principal do site
Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de Search
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="note-search"]' contains exact text 'TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH'.

kw.name: Dado que apresentou a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Dado que estou na tela principal do site
Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de Search
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="note-search"]' contains exact text 'TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to browser.

kw.name: Então após dar Enter é apresentado os resultados de buscas
Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to browser.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

test.name: Cenário 3 - Efetuar Consulta de único Resultado

kw.name: Dado que apresentou a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Dado que estou na tela principal do site
Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de Search
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="note-search"]' contains exact text 'TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to browser.

kw.name: Então após dar Enter é apresentado um único resultado em evidência
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="page-title"]' contains exact text 'BLACK LUX GRAPHIC T-SHIRT'.

kw.name: E após dar Enter é apresentado um único resultado e abaixo as opções de produtos relacionados
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="title-related"]' contains exact text 'RELATED PRODUCTS'.

test.name: Cenário 5 – Efetuar Consulta de produto inexistente

kw.name: Dado que apresentou a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Dado que estou na tela principal do site
Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'ToolsQA Demo Site – ToolsQA – Demo E-Commerce Site'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Quando clico na opção de Search
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então é apresentado a opção para digitar o produto a ser consultado
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: TYPE AND PRESS ENTER TO SEARCH
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Input Text

kw.name: Press Keys

kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to browser.

kw.name: Então após dar Enter é apresentado a mensagem de que não foi encontrado produto
Element Text Should Be
kw.arg: No products were found matching your selection.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class="woocommerce-info"]' contains exact text 'No products were found matching your selection.'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
